description: This file defines a Blits component named 'Results' for a quiz application front-end, rendering the results page with score details and navigation controls.

classes.name: Results
classes.description: A Blits component representing the Results page of the quiz, displaying scores, and providing navigation options.

methods.name: scoreText
methods.description: Computes and returns a string displaying the user's score out of total.

methods.name: buttonBg
methods.description: Computes the background color for the restart button, using theme colors if available.

methods.name: buttonFg
methods.description: Computes the foreground (text) color for the restart button, using theme colors if available.
